text: woven in the fabric of the Stars and
Stripes is a profound belief in the

maintain freedom but that devotion
carries a price the bullet went through
my chest and to my stomach my liver my

bullets four six inches from my head
this is a story not about the dead but
about those who lived meet rosemary

don't have the strength because

as usual you're looking at live pictures
they're Broward County Florida where

and America and moves on but some can't

they say lessons must be learned
